description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b. Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Light staining. Origin: Likely mid-19th century. Incipit: الحمد لله ... القسم الثاني في العقود وفيه خمسة عشر كتابا قوله كتاب التجارة
author: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559
abstract: Part 2 of al-Shahīd al-Thānī's commentary on Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām, a well-known work on Shiite fiqh. Contains al-Qism al-thānī fī al-ʻuqūd.
extent: 208 leaves : paper ; 301 x 200 (216 x 130) mm bound to 304 x 208 mm
title: Masālik al-afhām sharḥ Sharāyiʻ al-Islām fī masāʼil al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām
uniform title: مسالك الافهام في شرح شرائع الاسلام. قسم 2
creator: شهيد الثاني، زين الدين بن علي، 1506-1559
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
binding note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
